entry.title: Saturday: A few flurries. High minus 4.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending early this afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 18 this morning and minus 12 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Saturday 04 February 2023
